name: Dead men tell no tales
description:
Yaaaarrrrgggghhhh!

In Dead men tell no tales you create a band of yellow liver'd Pirates and travel across the treacherous black seas. Something sinister lies beneath, use all your cunning in this tactical survival game. Created for LD 29.

========================

Instructions:

Click the buttons to choose one of the following class of Pirate:

Cutlass: Close combat, high health, medium damage.
Rifle: Good range, low health, high damage
Grenade: V. Good range, low health, area damage
Healer: Low range, low health, heals injured Pirates

========================

Tools Used:

Unity (free)
Adobe Flash CS6 for drawing game assets
Audio: http://www.bfxr.net/
